Text: I gotta say... Ed is definitely the sneakiest with his plugs. Right in the middle of a topic, taking calls, whatnot he'll smoothly digress into mentioning a product for about 2 minutes then smoothly transition back to topic without skipping a beat. You really have to be on your toes time shifting.
I'm pretty good at fast-forwarding past the ads on my iPod Touch.  Ed has those live reads in the podcast version of his radio show too.
